name: RayMarch
description: This is a website that can render RayMarched scenes to produce 3D fractals. Written in c++ and using WebGL and WASM. The goal of this project was to create a Node based input (like Blenders shader nodes) to produce fractals in a user friendly manner.

images.title: Testing reflection
images.description: 4 spheres but at the cost of 2! 2 spheres are rendered on the right and xyz space is reflected.

images.title: What I have learnt
images.description: This project has taught me the complexities of integrating c++ in the browser using emscripten. Building a single page web app from scratch, so I learnt about Webpack and bundling. Integrating React into an existing project, without 'create react app'.
